description: Try our easy to follow Rolled Beef Skewers recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Rolled Beef Skewers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 lemongrass stem, white part only, finely chopped
1 handful kaffir lime leaves, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Combine minces, shallot, garlic, ginger, lime leaf (reserving a little for garnish), lemongrass, sugar and fish sauce in a large bowl until sticky. Divide into 16 equal portions and shape into short sausage lengths. Thread onto skewers. Chill for 1 hour.

Preheat chargrill or barbecue grill on high. Spray skewers with oil. Cook, turning frequently, for 8-10 minutes or until cooked through. Serve with lemon halves, reserved lime leaf, coriander and sesame seeds.
